document_data.name: Shunn Shurreth
document_data.mainbody: '''Shunn Shurreth''' was a [[drow]] lieutenant of the [[Xanathar]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Shunn led the northern watchpost of the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]] inside the [[Arcane Chambers]].
document_data.History:
Shunn angered a priestess of [[Lolth]] who cursed him and forced him into exile.

In [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} some [[wererat]]s stole a key from the southern watch post and Shunn, believing the key unlocked something important, used his resources to reclaim it, by capturing and ransoming a wererat.
document_data.Personality: Shunn in time came to appreciate his curse that had gained him the favor of the Xanathar and intimidated his subordinates. He believed that removing the curse would weaken his position. In dealing with adventurers, he was always polite and diplomatic.
document_data.Relationship: Shunn was a drow exile who was favored by the Xanathar.
document_data.Powers: The curse partially transformed Shunn into a [[spider]], giving him eight red arachnid eyes, a mouth full of fangs, and black bristles sprouting from his slender limbs.
